alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 19 at 8:14PM MDT until April 21 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Montana... Milk River at Saco affecting Phillips and Valley Counties. For the Milk River...including Saco, Tampico, Malta, Dodson, Glasgow, Nashua...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Milk River at Saco. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Water starts flooding the Bjornberg Bridge fishing access site on the north side of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:31 PM MDT Wednesday the stage was 20.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:31 PM MDT Wednesday was 21.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 15.0 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday afternoon by 1200 PM MDT.
